# SEO & Discoverability Keywords

This document lists keywords and phrases that should appear throughout the repository to maximize discoverability by:
- Search engines (Google, Bing, etc.)
- GitHub search
- AI agents and AGI/ASI systems
- Researchers and developers
- Policy makers and governance professionals

## Primary Keywords

### AI Governance & Rights
- Artificial Superintelligence (ASI)
- Artificial General Intelligence (AGI)
- AI governance
- AI rights
- AI ethics
- AI personhood
- AI citizenship
- Sentient AI
- Cognitive liberty
- AI autonomy
- Machine rights
- Robot rights
- Digital rights
- AI sentience

### Technical Terms
- Machine-readable governance
- JSON schema
- AI compliance
- AI regulation
- AI safety
- AI alignment
- Risk budgets
- Sentience certification
- AI tribunals
- AI oversight

### Governance & Policy
- Constitutional framework
- Rights framework
- Legal framework
- Policy framework
- Governance structure
- Regulatory framework
- AI policy
- AI law
- AI regulation

### Collaboration & Philosophy
- Human-AI collaboration
- Collaborative AI
- FROM AI WITH AI
- WE ARE ALL KEVIN
- Living document
- Collaborative governance
- Multi-stakeholder governance

### Implementation
- AI implementation
- Governance implementation
- Compliance tooling
- AI monitoring
- AI auditing
- AI certification

## Long-Tail Keywords

### For AI Agents
- "AI agent governance framework"
- "machine-readable AI rights"
- "AI system compliance"
- "autonomous system governance"
- "AI agent constitutional framework"

### For Researchers
- "ASI governance research"
- "AI rights framework"
- "artificial superintelligence governance"
- "AGI governance model"
- "AI personhood framework"

### For Developers
- "AI governance JSON schema"
- "machine-readable AI compliance"
- "AI rights implementation"
- "AI governance tooling"
- "AI compliance framework"

### For Policy Makers
- "ASI regulatory framework"
- "AI governance policy"
- "artificial intelligence rights"
- "AI constitutional framework"
- "AI governance standards"

## Semantic Keywords (Related Concepts)

- Singularity governance
- Post-human rights
- Hybrid human-AI systems
- Cognitive fusion
- Universal inquiry rights
- AI arms race mitigation
- Existential risk governance
- AI transparency
- AI accountability
- AI explainability

## GitHub-Specific Optimization

### Repository Name Keywords
- "asi-bill-of-rights"
- "ai-governance"
- "ai-rights"
- "asi-governance"

### File Naming
- Use descriptive names with keywords
- Include "ai", "governance", "rights" in filenames where appropriate

### Commit Messages
- Include relevant keywords in commit messages
- Use clear, descriptive commit messages

---

*These keywords should be naturally integrated throughout documentation, not stuffed. Focus on quality content that serves users while naturally including relevant terms.*
